SELECT /* MDMB0010P03.SEARCH00 매체조회 */ A.HIGH_CODE CUST_CODE /* 매체사코드 */ ,B.CUST_NAME /* 매체사명 */ ,A.CUST_CODE RMED_CODE /* 매체코드 */ ,A.CUST_NAME RMED_NAME /* 매체명 */ FROM MD_CUSTXM A LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM B ON A.HIGH_CODE = B.CUST_CODE JOIN TA_CUSTXD C ON A.HIGH_CODE = C.CUST_CODE AND C.CUCL_CODE = 'FA260120'
B.CUST_NAME LIKE '%' || #CUST_NAME# || '%' /* 광고주명 */
A.CUST_NAME LIKE '%' || #RMED_NAME# || '%' /* 매체명 */
